flawed_nl_solution:
There are 5-1=<<5-1=4>>4 more lions each month.
There will be 4*12=<<4*12=48>>48 more lions after 1 year.
There were 148-48=<<148-48=99>>99 lions in Londolozi at first.
#### 99

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 99. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
